title: Writing Terms of a Geometric Sequence
text: The sequence can be written in terms of the initial term and the common ratio r: $$3$$, $$3r$$, $$3r^2$$, $$3r^3$$, ...

title: Geometric Sequence Formula
text: The nth term of a geometric sequence is given by the explicit formula: $$a_n=a_1 r^{n-1}$$

title: Geometric Sequence Formula
text: Plug in $$a_4$$ for $$a_n$$ and $$3r^3$$ for $$a_1 r^{n-1}$$ in the formula.

title: Solving for Common Ratio
text: Using the fact that $$a_4=24$$, solve for $$r$$, the common ratio, in the equation. What does it equal?

title: Finding Second Term
text: Find the second term by multiplying the first term by the common ratio.
